name: Isnisia
declaringWar: Your puny empire has been a stain on my maps ever since I've uncovered it. Today I shall paint it a nice shade of blue.
introduction: Greetings, behind me stands the eternal and beautifully efficient Isnisian empire. I wish our nations may never come across eachother.
neutralHello: I yet have plans for your nation.
hateHello: I will burn your empire to the ground.
afterPeace: This war may not have been decisive, yet the next will be.
tradeRequest: I offer this cooperation to benefit both of our regimes.
uniques: [+1 Science, +1 Production] from all [Military Base] buildings
[+1 Culture, +1 Happiness] from all [Military Academy] buildings
[+1 Culture, +1 Production] from [Fort] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Science, +1 Culture, +1 Happiness, +1 Production] from all [Heroic Epic] buildings
[+2 Science, +2 Culture, +2 Happiness, +2 Production] from [Citadel] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness, +1 Culture] [in all cities with a garrison]

name: Isnisistan
startIntroPart1: 'I will build a great road' IsNss muttered,
startIntroPart2: And a great road he shall build.
defeated: My roads will last longer than your empire.
neutralHello: Would you like me to replace your entire road system?
tradeRequest: I have for you 30L of asphalt.
denounced: You're banned from my transit systems!
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Production] from [Road] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Culture, +1 Food, +1 Production] from [Railroad] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness, +1 Culture] [in all cities connected to capital]
Can build [All Road] improvements at a [+25]% rate
